unit_types.name: Light Infantry
unit_types.des: Only equip wooden shield and short sword, low attack, high defense, when fighting, standing on top can prevent arrows from shooting.

unit_types.name: Heavy Infantry
unit_types.des: Infantry equip iron shield and sword low attack high defense,, in battle standing above can block arrow.

unit_types.name: Well trained Heavy Infantry
unit_types.des: Infantry undergo training, equip iron shield and sword low attack high defense, in battle standing above can block arrow.

unit_types.name: Guard Iron Armor Binh
